Articles.Content:
Suit set now finished up, will probably add onto it in the future when I have time, files are currently jpgs but if somebody could convert to DDS then that would be a great help! Will update to png again when I have time. 

There's 3 tiers of suits, with a custom IVA and EVA and 3 diff variants for each, also includes a range of male/female head variations. 

Enjoy!

![RqspZfY.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/RqspZfY.jpg)

Download link:  [https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B0jTBhRYrQ-8ajBNTllIME5NRXc/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B0jTBhRYrQ-8ajBNTllIME5NRXc/view?usp=sharing)

Curseforge download link: [http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/233646-scart91-texture-pack-wip](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/233646-scart91-texture-pack-wip)

![qhMHAvZ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/qhMHAvZ.jpg)

![QEWORHa.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/QEWORHa.jpg)

![VRWydPb.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/VRWydPb.jpg)

And a couple pics to show off some detailing

![XEEsfQt.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/XEEsfQt.jpg)

![VTfSztE.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/VTfSztE.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2017-02-28T23:13:08Z" title="02/28/2017 11:13  PM" data-short="7 yr">February 28, 2017</time> by Scart91**
!!! Yay! I've been waiting for your new stuff ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I love the dirty used look good job. But I'm just gonna go ahead and ask... What's green that the kerbals are spilling all over? Like... Lime yogurt maybe? Make for a good snack.
They're scientists so it's the green goo! clumsy Kerbals ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Yay! Now Val will finally look as good as her peers.
Wow! This may become my go-to texture pack. Great work. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Amazing job, I love this texture pack! Thx.

I love your textures ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Do you mind if I put (create metadata) this on CKAN?
Is that DUCT TAPE on the helmet? Genius!

These look very nice!

Final some Kerbals with personality

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-19T20:42:34Z" title="08/19/2015 08:42  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 19, 2015</time> by FreeThinker**

> 
> They're scientists so it's the green goo! clumsy Kerbals ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Wait, is it possible green goo is...Kerbal blood? 

\*cringes\*

Thanks man! and yeah feel free

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Is that DUCT TAPE on the helmet? Genius!

Haha yeah, limited funding for repairing those budget suits! There's also some tears and stuff in the suit too with a cheeky bit of duct tact repair too, and the feet!
I love you. These are fantastic.
Good, but the textures should be PNG or DDS. JPGs don't really save memory in KSP.

How did I miss this! Going to grab it when i get home. Nice work, and thanks for the pack.

- - - Updated - - -

Also, kerbalstuff please?

> 
> Good, but the textures should be PNG or DDS. JPGs don't really save memory in KSP.

Yeah sorry about that I'll get around to doing it once I've sorted the pack a bit more/when I get time

PS: If anyone fancies properly packaging it into the right file types etc then feel free!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-21T21:20:27Z" title="08/21/2015 09:20  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 21, 2015</time> by Scart91**
Where are the visors? I don't seem them anywhere in the download.
Just saw this. Turns out you're not dead after all! I really like the suits, especially the goo-splattered Science one.

Hey Scart91.. There were suit textures made by you with the lttle class insignias back of helmets. There are many class oriented suit textures but i liked yours very much. It was posted under TextureReplacer 2.4.9 thread. But i think download link is dead.. Can you make it work or new suits with class insignias..
Any progress updates for us Scart?

> 
> 
> On 9/16/2015 at 9:20 AM, umur said:
> 
> 
> Hey Scart91.. There were suit textures made by you with the lttle class insignias back of helmets. There are many class oriented suit textures but i liked yours very much. It was posted under TextureReplacer 2.4.9 thread. But i think download link is dead.. Can you make it work or new suits with class insignias..
> 

Yeah, I was starting to look at suit texture replacements and those were really nice. I'd be cool with just those suits with no modifications done.
My goodness, this was amazing. Too bad the rest of the suit textures weren't ever finished! Thanks so much for the Kerbal heads, though Scart, I'll be using these!
does this mod work with 1.1.3?

> 
> 
> 13 hours ago, Smart Parts Wanter said:
> 
> 
> does this mod work with 1.1.3?
> 

Yes. So long as you have an Up to date version of Texture Replacer, it'l work.

Sorry for dropping off the radar guys, for people requesting the original kerbal class suits which download link broke, here's an updated working link [https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B0jTBhRYrQ-8UmZKeUpMbU1fUGc/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B0jTBhRYrQ-8UmZKeUpMbU1fUGc/view?usp=sharing)
